summary: Set in a 19th century village, a young man studying under a local doctor joins a team of hunters on the trail of a wolf-like creature.
cast: Ed Quinn|Guy Wilson|Stephen Rea|Rachel DiPillo|Adam Croasdell|Ana Ularu|Florin Piersic Jr.|Steven Bauer|Nia Peeples|Radu Iacoban|Zoltan Butuc|Emil Hostina|Dan Badarau|Ioan Ionescu|Ovidiu Niculescu|Claudiu Bleont|Marius Chivu|Corneliu Ulici|Ioana Abur|Stefan Iancu|Constantin Puscasu|Pat Elliott|Patricia Elliott|Michaelene Harrington|Lynne Schweitzer|Karl Brady|Iulia Cirstea|George Lungoci|George Remes|Mihai St√¢nescu|Meda Andreea Victor|Gavril Patru|Alexandra Coman|Andra Arghir|Alin Panc|Ozana Oancea|Corneliu Jipa|George Grigore|Robert Freeman|Karl Baker|Carla Maria Teaha|Constantin Barbulescu|Ozama Oancea|Razvan Gheorghiu|Deliu Ionut|Florin Stancu
title: Hombre Lobo: la bestia entre nosotros
